name: Discosub
body:
### Welcome to Discosub official website.
Discosub is a fingerprint tools that provide subdomain discover scanning on a root domain.

### Usages
via pipy:
```shell
$ pip install discosub
$ discosub run <specified root domain>
```

via github:
```shell
$ git clone https://github.com/4383/discosub
$ cd discosub
$ python setup.py install
$ discosub run <specified root domain>
```
### Features
* Root domain subdomain discover scanning.

### Authors and Contributors
Discosub was created by Hervé Beraud (@4383).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Discosub ? Report an [issue](https://github.com/4383/discosub/issues) or [contact the author](https://github.com/4383/) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
